text: The Mazda CX-30 is a car made by Mazda, a Japanese car brand It is a small Japanese crossover SUV that is positioned above the Mazda CX-3, and below the Mazda CX-5. It has a bold and stylish design fit into a small size. It is made for smaller places like urban areas. ==Details== It started production in October 2019, and is code named ‘DM’. It has a sleek and stylish design that fits is seen in a lot of Mazda cars. It is mainly produced in North American, Japan and China. It has another version called the Mazda MX-30. Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles CX-30
title: Mazda CX-30
